titleStmt.title: The Lombard-Street lecturer's late farewell sermon, answer'd: or, the Welsh Levite toss'd de novo A dialogue between David J-nes and Dr. John Bastwick; and lovewit and fairman, two of his late parishioners. Addressed to the banker of Lombard-Street.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the assigns of John Bastwick, and sold by T.J. without Temple-Barr,

notesStmt.note: In answer to Jones, David. "A farewel-sermon preached to the united parishes of St. Mary Woolnoth, & St. Mary Woolchurch-Haw in Lombard-Street".
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
